landing.pleaseConnectWallet: Please connect your wallet to use the Application
landing.whileWalletIsNotConnected: While your wallet is not connected, you can see our New

individual.title: Individual KYC
individual.blockedCountriesAlert: Our service is currently unavailable to citizens of the United States or North Korea.

verifyCode.title: Enter the code
verifyCode.subTitle: A 6-digit verification code has been sent to your email. Enter the code below to verify your email.

verifyEmail.title: Verify your Email
verifyEmail.subTitle: Get a verification code sent to your email address so we can confirm that you are not a robot.

confirmation.title: Verification code has been confirmed successfully.

steps.4: 4. Send the code to the Bot

verifyDocuments.title: Verfiy Documents
verifyDocuments.description: Please note that your documents will be verified through the ComplyCube service. This process may take some time, and you will be notified within 10-15 minutes.
verifyDocuments.authenticity: Document Authenticity: No copied or expired documents allowed
verifyDocuments.liveliness: Liveliness Test: A mandatory selfie is required to verify your identity
verifyDocuments.confirmation: I confirm that I have read and understood the Eligibility and Document Requirements.

launchpad.heading: Invest in Startups and Other Unicorn Like Opportunities

successful.title: Successful
successful.body: This deal was successfully funded and reached above it’s soft cap funding goal.

unsuccessful.title: Unsuccessful
unsuccessful.body: This deal was unsuccessfully funded and did not reach above it’s soft cap funding goal.

accreditedInvestors.title: Accredited investors only
accreditedInvestors.body: You have to be an accredited investor (AI) to access this deal.

softCap.title: Soft Cap
softCap.body: This is the minimum amount that needs to be raised for the deal to be successful.

participants.title: Participants
participants.body: Number of investors that has participated in this deal

investmentStage.title: Investment Stage
investmentStage.body: The time provided is based on your local time at {{utcTime}}

whitelist.title: Register To Invest
whitelist.body: You need to register to invest in order to participate in the pre-sale round. This stage does not apply for the Public Sale.

preSale.title: Pre-Sale
preSale.body: The pre-sale round has its own maximum and minimum investment sizes that may differ from the public sale. You need to register to invest in order to participate in the pre-sale round.

publicSale.title: Public Sale
publicSale.body: Public sale is open to everyone and will close on the date scheduled or as otherwise determined by the issuer.

closed.title: Closed
closed.body: The deal is closed for any further investments.

claim.title: Token Claim
claim.body: For successful deals that reached their funding goal, you will receive the tokens that you purchased. You can claim back your initial investment for unsuccessful deals that did not reach their funding goal.

additionalDocs.title: Additional Documents
additionalDocs.placeholder: There are no Documents to display

maintenance.title: We're down for Maintenance
maintenance.info: This page is undergoing maintenance and will be back soon

footer.subscribeSubtitle: Get the latest updates and news delivered directly to your inbox.

about.description: IX Swap is built by a global team of capital markets, legal and blockchain experts, bringing you the next generation of trading for Security tokens and tokenized stocks.
